General.Name: Myer Holdings Limited
General.Description: Myer Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates department stores in Australia. It offers womenswear, menswear, childrenswear, homewares, beauty products, electrical goods, toys, gift products, and general merchandise. The company operates 58 stores under the Myer brand name. It is also involved in the online retailing business under the sass & bide, and Marcs and David Lawrence brand names. In addition, the company provides customer loyalty programs. Myer Holdings Limited was founded in 1900 and is based in Docklands, Australia.
General.Address: 1000 La Trobe Street, Docklands, VIC, Australia, 3008
